subject: Question about shipping origin
description_text:
Greetings.

I'm playing with the idea of ordering a set of pedals from your company but
I have a conundrum regarding where to order them from.
The options are between your aliexpress store or directly from your
website.
And there lies the question, does your company have a warehouse and
distribution center in Europe for continental distribution, or would I be
better off ordering from aliexpress where some  pedals are seemingly
shipped from europe and deffinetly include VAT.  I am looking at Plus X
pedal set (aliexpress shows PRO X as shipps from EU).

Thank for your answer in advance,
Matic L

conversations.body_text: Hello Matic Lindicï¼Œ    You can purchase directly from our website to enjoy more discounts.  We do have a warehouse in Germany, but the Plus X in the German warehouse ran out of stock two days ago. The latest batch of goods is expected to arrive around the 7th. You can purchase first and note that you want shipping from Germany, and we will prioritise your shipment when it arrives.
